content: materials - 3 00 mm crochet hook - 100 % cotton yarn for a 3 00 mm hook - polyfiber fill for stuffing - tapestry needle - two wooden sticks to hang the mobile i bought this one for my niece colors - 4 colors for the hot air balloon - 1 color for the basket - 1 contrasting color for the straps that hold the basket and the ruffles - white for the clouds
